text: They attack enemies with venomous daggers and excellent armor.
Witches blessed by Khaine gain greater power, allowing them to heal their wounds with each attack.
They are Daughters of Khaine who revel in blood.
Blood Sisters are skilled in sneaking behind enemies, using their daggers to slowly torment their prey.
Murderous creatures lurking in the shadows created by Morathi.
The handmaidens created by Morathi using dark magic, skilled in long-range magic attacks and close combat with spears.
Servants of the Shadow Maiden, chosen by the Cult of Pleasure and trained by the Shadow Maiden.
Executioners of Khaine, specialized in assassination missions, who can not only throw massive chakrams but also excel in close combat.
